             2018 
                             
                                             
     Feb 5, 2018 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Appointment of New President 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF NEW PRESIDENT Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW–February 5, 2018) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) is pleased to announce the appointment of Frank Wheatley as President of the Company, effective as of today. The Company intends for Mr. ...      Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Appointment of CFO and Grants of Stock Options 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF CFO AND GRANTS OF STOCK OPTIONS Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW–December 15, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) is pleased to announce the appointment of Ms. Danielle Favreau as Chief Financial Officer. The Company also announces the ...  Read More 
 
                                             
     Dec 6, 2017 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Completion of Magnesium Testing 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES COMPLETION OF MAGNESIUM TESTING Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW–December 6, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) announces the completion of magnesium testing by industry leading experts in mineral processing, Saskatchewan Research Council (“SRC”).
